mapper.select: SELECT marker.seq, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, road_address, address, name, category_seq, title, contents, tel, use_yn FROM marker INNER JOIN category ON category.seq = marker.category_seq WHERE use_yn='Y';
SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marker ( x_coordinate, y_coordinate, road_address, address, category_seq, title, contents, tel, use_yn ) VALUES ( #{x_coordinate}, #{y_coordinate}, #{road_address}, #{address}, #{category_seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{tel}, 'Y' );
